description:
This is a market on the price comparison of two cryptocurrencies: Cardano ($ADA) and Polygon ($MATIC) for the resolution time of November 4, 2021, at 8:00 PM ET. 

The resolution source for this market will be prices listed on CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en). 

If, according to the resolution source, $ADA has a greater candlestick closing price (C) than $MATIC at the resolution time,  this market will resolve to “Cardano”. If, according to the resolution source, $MATIC has a greater candlestick closing price (C) than $ADA at the resolution time, this market will resolve to “Polygon”. 

If the candlestick closing price of both cryptocurrencies up to the hundredth decimal place is exactly the same at the resolution time, this market will resolve 50-50.

If for any reason the resolution data is unavailable, another credible source will be used.
-----------------------------------------------
C - This market will resolve on the “C” (i.e. closing price) listed for the candle titled “Thu 04 November 2021, 20:00:00” with the “Price” tab selected, in the Eastern Time Zone. 

To see the candlestick close price, click the candlestick icon on the cryptocurrency price chart, observe the number after the “C:” when you hover over a candlestick for a given time period.

Note, this 20:00:00 candle lists the opening price for 07:30:00 PM ET and the closing price for 08:00:00 PM ET. To allow for updates, this market will resolve on the number listed for the referenced candle at exactly 8:25 PM ET, on November 4, 2021.

events.title: Will the price of $MATIC (Polygon) or $ADA (Cardano) be higher on November 4th?

question: Will the price of $MATIC (Polygon) or $ADA (Cardano) be higher on November 4th?
